Name: Foeders
Review Text: Fantastic place‚Ä¶had a great time here. Warm, welcoming environment with a relaxed vibe. Maud at the bar was so passionate and knowledgeable about beer and made great recommendations for ones to try. Loved the New England IPA, herbal blonde, and original sour. And unlimited peanuts are a nice touch :)

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Nice place, decent selection of beers, very polite stuff. However, the bar shows signs of abandonment

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Great place for a dram, great selection of beers. The bartender is a very friendly person and has a lot of knowledge üòÅüòâ the mixed meat and cheese platter is wonderful and you will have free peanuts, which is not common around

Name: Foeders
Review Text: What an incredible bar, the beer list was staggeringly good. A very diverse range of styles on offer and the fridges packed full of lambic are something else. The lady behind the bar was very very knowledgeable and helpful. Makes me wonder ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Fantastic place for any beer lover. Small and cozy, staff is knowledgeable and caring, selection is curated to precision and everyone will find something to fit their taste and even more. Fridge of rare spontaneous bottles is a cave of treasures. A must visit when in Amsterdam.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Small pub with great selections of sours! Super friendly owner and highly recommend to check out their beers

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Wonderful place with a great beer selection. Very passionate owner. You can also order some bar food alongside of your geuzes and lambics. Ask for the specials if your into sours.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Went there with friends in late evening. Cosy and amazing atmosphere. Great selection of the beers, great but I really mean great staff/crew. Definitely recommended!!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: I am Belgian and I feel at home in this bar! Cosy atmosphere, great choice of beers, friendly and expert staff! Just hope you‚Äôre not allergic to peanuts ü•ú

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Great selection of beers. We visited today and it was a really friendly atmosphere. We saw that Foeders was highly rated but were not sure if we found the right place as it's not obviously signposted on the outside, but when you see the ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Flawless location in Amsterdam for some quality beers. Both very exclusive sours and accessible beers on tap. Staff is very friendly, knowledgable about the beer and helpful. Must-visit for beer enthusiasts in Amsterdam.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Best craft beer bar experience ever! You receive water as a welcome, on tables there are waiting for you peanuts, fantastic beers and tasty tapas are served by extremely nice and kind service! I will definetely come back once I‚Äôm again in Amsterdam! THANKS, Foeders!!!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Best craft beer bar in Amsterdam. Awesome staff and great knowledge of the local brews on tap. Top notch ossenworst. Must stop in Amsterdam for craft beer lovers.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: We were instantly greeted by a humble and pleasant Yuri. Fantastic beer and service and again the owner Yuri is a gent who takes the low key approach. I would maybe recommend an Uber for those staying close to the city centre but going ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Great lovely amazing place with 42 fantastic typical Dutch and Belgium craft beer!! Bravo. I am happy. And Anouk is the best profesional lady

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Super friendly staff and nice selection of beers. A place to check out in Amsterdam especially for sour beer lovers.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Hands down one of the best beer places I've ever been to. Great selection, atmosphere, staff, peanuts! As soon as you walk in and you inhale the musky beer smell, hear the people chattering and smiling and step on the heaps of peanuts ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Phenomenal selection of regional craft beers. Accommodating service and friendly conversation. It's a local joint, but not in a bad way. Cozy and dark with peanut shells on the floor. I'll be back before I skip town.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Fantastic atmosphere, excellent collection. Must visit for any beer lover.

Name: Foeders
Review Text:
Awesome and interesting beer collection, and staff will gladly help you pick the right one! Plus free peanuts you can throw on the floor :)
Edit, after second visit review still valid!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Great local pub with good selection of draft beers

Name: Foeders
Review Text: One of the best beer bars I have ever been to

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Very good beer selection, friendly staff.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Great beer. Very friendly and knowledgeable staff

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Great beer selection and the bartender was very knowledge. She was spot on with recommendations. I highly suggests all craft beer fans make a stop here!!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Genuinely might be one of my favorite craft beer places in Europe. Staff know their stuff and are incredibly friendly and fun. Good atmosphere even when the bar is quiet and, most of all, a great selection of taps. Hard recommend!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: What a gem. Very small and cozy place with high quality sour beers in the fridge. One of few places in Europe that have Bokke beers. Large tap line (40+) friendly staff with good know-how. I will definitely come again and recommend it to all my beer geek friends.... well done

Name: Foeders
Review Text: I went here earlier this week for the first time having been to Amsterdam many times.  This is the place to go for seriously good beer.  If the numerous taps and busy menu seem daunting don't worry.  The cool, friendly and knowledgable bar ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: A friend recommended this craft beer bar to us. I'm very pleased we visited. The range of beers is astounding. They advice and help in choosing beers is fantastic. A nice little touch is the glass of monkey nuts on every table. ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Love it... If you're looking for a really special beer this is the place for you in Amsterdam.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Sir, you have an awesome place ! The attention for detail and the masterfulness way you poor a glass of beer is amazing ! The selection is really good ! I didn't wan't to leave... :(

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Excellent selection of sour beer. Pleasant and friendly staff. The peanuts are a nice touch as well. The clientele seems to consist in large part of regulars, but new people are also welcome. Aesthetically it feels old fashioned in a nice way. There is a TV but it is not the focus of attention except perhaps when ajax is playing.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: This has to be the best craft beer bar in Amsterdam, hands down. If you love craft beer, especially lambics and sours, there's no other place you need to go. Yuri is as kind, attentive, passionate, and knowledgeable; a real gem of a person. ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Yuri has an amazing selection of Belgian beers. His knowledge and passion far exceeds any other bar I‚Äôve ever been to.  What a genuine gentleman with a hardworking mind set.  If your a local then you may already know this place, as a ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: This place is amazing it's the neighborhood bar you wished you had. Amazing staff, and an equally amazing selection of beer. Their lambic and spontaneous beer selection is one of the best in Amsterdam. A must stop for anyone with the even the tiniest of interest in beer.

Name: Foeders
Review Text:
Strange but wonderful mix of speciality beer bar and neighborhood pub.

Owner is a really great Belgian guy, who listens to your wishes and goes out of ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Great atmosphere, very nice owner. A glass of peanuts is presented on every table and the shells can just be thrown on the ground after you ate the nuts. Also there is a great variety of good beers available.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: From the large selection of craft beers on tap to the amazing and friendly service, this is a must go for any local or tourist!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Amazing local bar with a great beer selection. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable about CNN the beers they have on tap. Very willing to help you select the beers that fits your tastes and desires.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: The best beer bar in Amsterdam, hands down. Especially if you're into Belgian styles. 40 taps with some awesome beers, a great bottle selection, good service, and peanuts!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: In short, this is the place all the other bartenders go when they want to drink beer. The best beer bar, the most important beer bar in the city. Yuri is the owner, the scientist, and the mayor. He is humble and the place is is modest, just ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Large selection of quality craft beers on draft, true hostmanship, lovely venue. A home away from home!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Visited on a brief trip to Amsterdam a few months back and stumbled in, jet-lagged, to the bar nearest to where I was staying. Little did I know it would be such an amazing beer bar and the highlight of my trip. Wonderful selection and great people! Thanks!

Name: Foeders
Review Text:
Looking for the best bar in Amsterdam? This is it!

Foeders specialises in Belgian and Dutch beers. They have over 30 taps and a ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Hear me out! If you are in Amsterdam and you love good quality beer, especially sours, this is THE PLACE for you to visit. Foeders isn't in the heart of the city center but in very easy(!) walk distance from it. In this recently opened ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Best place in Amsterdam. Period! The atmosphere in the bar is amazing!! Good beers for a good price. Very nice bartenders each time I visit. Just a wholesome experience <3 Much love.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Bar is owned by a Belgium guy. Great selection of geuze and also imperial stout is a common one in there great selection of good beers. Recommended! Open until 3, local atmosphere

Name: Foeders
Review Text: What can I say, this bar is a 10/10. It‚Äôs everything you want out of your local neighborhood bar. Great staff, great owner, and the best selection of beer from niche breweries all over. Thanks Yuri!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: One of the best craft beer places in Amsterdam. I felt right at home after my first visit and now it's one of my favorites. The owner and staff are super and the beer list is top-notch

Name: Foeders
Review Text: I cannot recommend this cozy, craft beer mecca enough. Yuri has really invested in his establishment, from amazing staff to phenomenal beer selection, to the welcoming atmosphere. Excited to see the second location...now we have to come back every year üòÅüçª

Name: Foeders
Review Text: A nice little bar but with a mighty 36 beers on tap. A really good selection of Belgian lambics and local beers. The De Kromme Haring beers are also very good.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Small, cosy brew pub with a great selection of beer on tap (more than 20). Large bottled selection available too, especially if you're into Belgian geuze and sours.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Great selection of beer paired with high quality snacks! In top of this, great customer service and beer advice from the owner himself! This bar is a great example of a business run with passion and care for excellence!

Name: Foeders
Review Text:
Lovely pub with super friendly host and a great selection of beers.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Small beer bar out of the way of the busy life. Very cool selection of beers that changes frequently. Fancy a lambic? Come on over and empty that fridge stuffed with lambic based beers!

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Yuri behind the bar was outstanding. Gave us many recommendations for other great bars across Amsterdam and the rest of the Netherlands. ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: The place of places for acolytes to the cult of Dionysus. Everything's been said already, but this is the only place I'll spend 45 EU on a beer and be grateful for it, and secondly Yuri and his fantastic staff rock. They made our kids feel welcome, they really loved it.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: This was a great little pub in an amazing area! Fantastic service. Stop by and try all the different Dutch and Belgian beers on tap, and make sure to throw those peanut shells on the floor.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Probably the best craft beer bar in Amsterdam, Foeders has over 30 beers on tap that are continuously curated and rotated by the owner.  Every week you can expect to find something new on the wall menus, and enjoy discovering new flavours! ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: My gf and I discovered this bar near our hotel and it was honestly the best part of our entire trip. Yuri is a great bartender and and an all around great person. As two people who don't drink beer too often, Yuri was able to show us ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Nice bar, lots of beers. They will let you try them to check if you actually like the beer. Which is nice as the beers differ a lot from each other. The bar is a bit too expensive hence the 4 stars. ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Randomly walked in here, great pub for beer lovers.

Name: Foeders
Review Text: Right up there in my top 5 global bars. 3 Fonteinen vintage sensibly priced samples alongside the wonderful Dutch Oedipus on draught. Loads of well thought out beer here in easy to reach location. It gets no better. Add to this a nicely ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: I love this local bar in de Pijp, Amsterdam. The bar breathes a very local atmosphere and they have a great variety on drinks and food options. The staff is extremely friendly and quick to serve. One of the better places to catch a soccer match of Ajax as well. Next time I visit Amstersam I will try to go here again.

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice beer bar with friendly staff. Prices for the slightly more special beers are on the high side. Peeling unlimited peanuts is of course great! ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders

Name: Foeders

Name: Foeders
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Had a great afternoon. You can drink 15cl glasses to taste anything. Everything fresh on tap and super tasty cheese platter. Very friendly service! ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Great brown cafe! Got it recommended by one was completely as expected. The owner is happy to do his job and has an assortment that has been collected with passion. The events here also seem to be great. ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super nice bar. Great beers, very attentive, fun and good service. Shell peanuts as much as you want. We had a successful evening for the umpteenth time. ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I like to come here. Super innkeeper who knows what he's talking about. Can perfectly combine food and beer. There are many events where the Vrijmibo is a must! Free snacks is a bonus. Top tasting room! ‚Ä¶

Name: Foeders
